item.title: Learnings from 10+ years of my software development work
item.description: After being in this industry for more than a decade now, there are a huge set of learnings that I have gathered. From programming microprocessors in assembly language on a dedicated hardware programmer to working on petabyte scale data pipelines, I have gained experience with many different paradigms of programming world. Also, from working in a small one-room startup to a global conglomerate, to starting my own, I have also experienced many different organizational aspects and how they shape the entire software development process.
